dc:title: Hilaire Belloc
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: A brief obituary remembering the author Hilaire Belloc, his visit to the Catholic Worker, his "great zest and joy in life," and his books on property and the state. Calls him "an apostle to this world."
